home.description: I'm Simon Sohneg, a certified developer and former baker. Driven by curiosity and a love for creating things, I turned my passion into a career. Now I build websites, apps, software and games.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: A journey from flour to code
about.chapter1Text: As a kid, I always said: I'll either become a baker or work in IT. So I became a baker first. I learned the craft by hand in a small bakery – with the best sourdough around. Then I worked at larger operations. 10 years of early mornings, turning simple ingredients into something delicious. I loved making people happy.
about.chapter2Text: My flour allergy kept getting worse – until one day I couldn't breathe anymore. I pushed through for a while because I loved the job. But then it became clear: time for Plan B. Or was it actually Plan A all along?
about.chapter3Text: Disability insurance enabled me to start a second apprenticeship – and Schindler Elevators gave me the chance. I learned so much there: from VoIP communication (I built a fallback website for emergency calls during network outages) to working in R&D on the top-secret Schindler X8. My first project? A parallax effect in Unity with face tracking – luckily I'd already been tinkering with it as a hobby. The camera tracked my position, turning the screen into a window to a 3D world. That's when I knew: this is my thing.
about.chapter4Text: Now I work at Brabender Solutions. There I develop a comprehensive business system and a document AI. I love solving complex problems and making people's lives easier.
about.chapter5Text: In my free time, I founded Tuning Schweiz – a car community with over 8,500 members, its own event app and website. I also build VR experiences and games, and tinker with Raspberry Pis. My projects are my playground.
about.chapter6Text: I don't lock myself into one tech stack – I pick the right tool for each project. Web, apps, VR, or games: what matters is bringing ideas to life. The passion for creating stayed – only the medium changed.
about.chapter7Text: When I'm not coding, I make electronic music as Sonex or DJ in VRChat. And our two Pomskies Ari and Luci make sure I get enough fresh air.
about.closingQuote: I still make cookies – they just have a different meaning now.

tuningSchweiz.title: Tuning Schweiz App
tuningSchweiz.description: A custom event app for Switzerland's largest car community with over 8,500 members. Features event management, meetup coordination, and community features.
tuningSchweiz.thought: My passion project! Started as a small idea and grew into something amazing.

businessSystem.title: Business Management System
businessSystem.description: A complete enterprise solution including CRM, time tracking, document management, and workflow automation. Built for Brabender Solutions.
businessSystem.thought: Learning so much about enterprise architecture here!

vrElevator.title: VR Marketing Experience
vrElevator.description: An immersive virtual reality application for elevator manufacturers, allowing customers to experience products in a virtual showroom.
vrElevator.thought: My first VR project – seeing people's reactions was priceless!

dogCamera.title: Pomsky Cam
dogCamera.description: A Raspberry Pi-powered dog camera that monitors our two Pomskies and sends real-time updates to Discord when it detects activity.
dogCamera.thought: Built this because I missed our fluffballs during work!

crowDesk.title: Crow Desk
crowDesk.description: A professional task management platform for teams, featuring project organization, task tracking, team collaboration, and a client portal with real-time updates.
crowDesk.thought: A challenging project that pushed my full-stack skills!

syncShift.title: Sync Shift
syncShift.description: A mobile time tracking app developed for an industrial company. Employees can start, pause, and end shifts, as well as add notes – available on Android & iOS.
syncShift.thought: Simple concept, but the details made it interesting!

clientWebsites.title: Client Websites
clientWebsites.description: Various websites built for local businesses and organizations using WordPress, featuring custom designs and functionality tailored to each client's needs.
clientWebsites.thought: Love helping local businesses get online!
